statements: SELECT * FROM follow_up_actions;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM follow_up_actions;
SELECT lead_name, follow_up_criteria FROM follow_up_actions WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT * FROM follow_up_actions WHERE lead_id = 100;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status, follow_up_action FROM follow_up_actions ORDER BY lead_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_actions WHERE lead_status='Active' ORDER BY lead_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM follow_up_actions WHERE lead_status='Pending' ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT lead_name, follow_up_action FROM follow_up_actions WHERE lead_status='Inactive' ORDER BY lead_id ASC LIMIT 5, 5;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_actions WHERE follow_up_criteria LIKE '%Email%' AND lead_status='Active';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, follow_up_action FROM follow_up_actions WHERE follow_up_action='Call' AND lead_status='Pending' ORDER BY lead_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_actions WHERE action_id = 1;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM lead_status;
SELECT action_description, criteria FROM follow_up_actions WHERE lead_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_actions WHERE criteria LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM lead_status ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM lead_status WHERE lead_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM follow_up_actions WHERE criteria LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY action_id DESC;
SELECT action_id, action_description FROM follow_up_actions WHERE lead_id = 12345 AND criteria = 'Urgent';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_status FROM lead_status WHERE lead_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND lead_status != 'Closed' ORDER BY lead_name ASC, lead_email DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM lead_status WHERE lead_email LIKE '%@example.com%' AND lead_status = 'Pending' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads WHERE lead_status='Active';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM Leads ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, follow_up_criteria FROM Leads WHERE follow_up_criteria IS NOT NULL;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM Leads WHERE lead_status IN ('New', 'Follow-up');
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads WHERE lead_status = 'Active';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, follow_up_criteria FROM Leads JOIN FollowUpActions ON Leads.lead_id = FollowUpActions.lead_id WHERE action_due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, criteria_name, criteria_threshold FROM Leads JOIN Criteria ON Leads.follow_up_criteria = Criteria.criteria_name;
SELECT lead_id, action_type, action_description, action_due_date FROM FollowUpActions WHERE lead_id = 5 ORDER BY action_due_date DESC;
SELECT lead_name, COUNT(*) AS total_follow_ups FROM Leads JOIN FollowUpActions ON Leads.lead_id = FollowUpActions.lead_id GROUP BY lead_name HAVING total_follow_ups > 2;
SELECT * FROM LeadCriteria;
SELECT lead_id, criteria_description FROM LeadCriteria ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT action_id, action_description FROM LeadActions WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM LeadFollowUp WHERE followup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT lead_id, lead_status FROM LeadStatus WHERE lead_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM LeadCriteria;
SELECT lead_id, criteria_description FROM LeadCriteria WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT lead_id, action_id, action_description FROM LeadActions ORDER BY action_id DESC;
SELECT lead_id, followup_date, followup_status FROM LeadFollowUp WHERE followup_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY followup_date ASC;
SELECT LeadStatus.lead_id, lead_status, criteria_description FROM LeadStatus JOIN LeadCriteria ON LeadStatus.lead_id = LeadCriteria.lead_id;
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads WHERE lead_status = 'New';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_phone FROM Leads ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Criteria WHERE criteria_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT action_name, action_type FROM FollowUpActions ORDER BY action_type DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads WHERE lead_status='New';
SELECT * FROM Criteria WHERE criteria_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, criteria_name FROM Leads JOIN LeadCriteria ON Leads.lead_id = LeadCriteria.lead_id JOIN Criteria ON LeadCriteria.criteria_id = Criteria.criteria_id;

SELECT lead_name, action_name FROM Leads JOIN LeadCriteria ON Leads.lead_id = LeadCriteria.lead_id JOIN CriteriaActions ON LeadCriteria.criteria_id = CriteriaActions.criteria_id JOIN FollowUpActions ON CriteriaActions.action_id = FollowUpActions.action_id WHERE Leads.lead_status='Active';

SELECT lead_name, lead_email, action_name, action_type FROM Leads JOIN LeadCriteria ON Leads.lead_id = LeadCriteria.lead_id JOIN CriteriaActions ON LeadCriteria.criteria_id = CriteriaActions.criteria_id JOIN FollowUpActions ON CriteriaActions.action_id = FollowUpActions.action_id WHERE Leads.lead_status='Follow-up';
